description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the remote code execution (RCE) vulnerability associated with the Microsoft WDAC OLE DB provider for SQL Server:

1. Download and apply the KB5034763 or any relevant KB update from the Microsoft Update Catalog based on your Windows version.
2. Restart your system after installation to ensure that updates take effect.

**Details**:
This update addresses a heap-based buffer overflow which could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. Ensure to follow the links provided for the correct version of your operating system:
- [KB5034763 Update Package](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763)
- [KB5034765 Update Package](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765)
- [KB5034766 Update Package](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034766)
- [KB5034774 Update Package](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034774)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is running a compatible version of Windows as detailed in the build numbers section of the CVE post.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
